article_title: Former HealthSource RI chief arrested on social-host charges
article_text: Sign up for our newsletter and have the top headlines from your community delivered right to your inbox

article_metadata.description:
The woman who launched Rhode Island's health insurance exchange was arrested at her Jamestown home early Sunday morning and charged with violating the state's "social host" law.
Christine C. Ferguson, 56, the former executive director of HealthSource RI, was charged along with her husband with furnishing/procuring alcohol for someone under 21 years old, according to the Jamestown police.
Officers investigated two complaints for a loud party on Bay View Drive, the first around midnight, the
article_metadata.author: Patrick  Anderson
